nodes.bodyText: @olenagerasimova V2 should be upper-cased here, see https://www.jfrog.com/confluence/display/JFROG/Repository+Configuration+JSON
@olenagerasimova we may need to support different parameters later, e.g. remote or virtual rclass and non docker repositories
@g4s8 hm, do not see any problems: we introduce class for these parameters and this method will return optional of this new class instead of just string. Or do you think I should do it now?
